Package com.zoubworld.java.utils.compress.file

Class BinaryPipeAlgo

java.lang.Object
com.zoubworld.java.utils.compress.file.BinaryFinFout
com.zoubworld.java.utils.compress.file.BinaryPipeAlgo
All Implemented Interfaces:
IBinaryReader, IBinaryWriter
public class BinaryPipeAlgo
extends BinaryFinFout
Author:
Pierre Valleau this class can be used to do a processing on a Binary data: a compression, an encryption, and redondancy adder, or a checker adder.

  • Constructor Summary

    Constructors 
    Constructor Description
    BinaryPipeAlgo​(int mykey, int keysize, boolean encrypt, IBinaryReader readerToOverride)
    for caesar cipher, piplines a IBinaryReader This will override the behaviour of reader to de/encrypt the data. my key is an integer between 0 and 1^keysize-1 keysize : 1,2,4,8,16,32 encrypt=true, will encrypt the data from reader encrypt=false, will decrypt the data from reader
    BinaryPipeAlgo​(int mykey, int keysize, boolean encrypt, IBinaryWriter writerToOverride)
    for caesar cipher, piplines a IBinaryWriter this will override the behaviour of writer to de/encrypt the data. my key is an integer between 0 and 1^keysize-1 keysize : 1,2,4,8,16,32 encrypt=true, will encrypt the data to writer encrypt=false, will decrypt the data to writer
    BinaryPipeAlgo​(ICryptoAlgo algo, boolean encrypt, IBinaryReader readerToOverride)
    This will override the behaviour of reader to de/encrypt the data. my key an int between 0 and 1^keysize-1 keysize : 1,2,4,8,16,32 encrypt=true, will encrypt the data from reader encrypt=false, will decrypt the data from reader
    BinaryPipeAlgo​(ICryptoAlgo algo, boolean encrypt, IBinaryWriter writerToOverride)
    this will override the behaviour of writer to de/encrypt the data. my key an int between 0 and 1^keysize-1 keysize : 1,2,4,8,16,32 encrypt=true, will encrypt the data to writer encrypt=false, will decrypt the data to writer
